newsitem.title: USA: CBOE to list 13 equity options on Sept 4.
newsitem.headline: CBOE to list 13 equity options on Sept 4.

text.p: The Chicago Board Options Exchange (CBOE) said it would list options on 13 stocks on September 4.
The 13 stocks include American Radio Systems Corp, Central Garden & Pet Co, CINergy Corp and Cityscape Financial Corp.
Also, COREStaff Inc, Duriron Co Inc, Henry Schein Inc, Nuevo Energy Co, Olympic Steel Inc, Proxim Inc, Pure Atria Corp, Tracor Inc and U.S. Diagnostic Labs Inc.

American Radio options will have initial strike prices of 30, 35 and 40, with expirations in September, October, January and April. Option Resource Group has been named the designated primary market maker (DPM).
Central Garden & Pet options will open with strikes of 22-1/2. 25 and 30 and expirations in September, October, November and February. Susquehanna Investment Group will be the DPM.
CINergy options will start with strikes of 25, 30 and 35 and expirations in September, October, December and March. The options will trade in the Texas Instruments trading crowd.
Cityscape options will have strikes of 30, 35 and 40, with expirations in September, October, January and April. The options will trade in the Best Buy trading crowd.
COREStaff options will have strikes of 40, 45 and 50, with expirations in September, October, December and March. Group One will be the DPM.
Duriron options will have strikes of 22-1/2, 25 and 30, with expirations in September, October, November and February. TradeNet LP will be the DPM.
Henry Schein options will have strikes of 30, 35 and 40, with expirations in September, October, January and April.
Susquehanna will be the DPM for Henry Schein.
Nuevo options will have strikes of 30, 35 and 40, with expirations in September, October, January and April. Saliba Partners will be the DPM.
Olympic Steel options will have strikes of 22-1/2, 25 and 30, with expirations in September, November and February. Eclipse LLC will be the DPM.
Proxim options will have strikes of 25, 30 and 35, with expirations in September, October, December and March. Genesis Trading Group will be the DPM.
Pure Atria options will have strikes of 25, 30 and 35, with expirations in September, October, December and March. Group One has will be the DPM.
Tracor options will have strikes of 17-1/2, 20 and 22-1/2, with expirations in September, October, January and April. The options will trade in the Wal-Mart Stores trading crowd.
U.S. Diagnostic options will have strikes of 7-1/2, 10 and 12-1/2, with expirations in September, October, November and February. Genesis Trading will be the DPM.
